column1:
Barclaycard Payment by Mageplaza
Barclaycard is the UK’s payment gateway reaching customers and clients globally across 40 countries. Barclaycard facilitates every online payment with all major credit cards including Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Maestro, Diners Club and JCB.
